title: Best Riven Skin
body:
In my opinion the default is trash. I've been deciding between Dawnbringer and Championship.

Dawnbringer:
Dawnbringer I've heard to be very smooth, thicc, looks splash art is amazing, looks cool and the animations are huge. But of course I have doubts, the animations could stuff up my combos because of how large they are, I'm kinda not liking the skin in character model wise but the Ultimate is amazing #SuperSaiyanFishRiven.

Championship:
This skin looks amazing, the animations, the colour looks very nice. Though, the splash art, the model is nice but ehhh, the regular sword looks weird and the Ultimate sword looks weird as well. Also I have to wait till Worlds to buy the skin off Store.

replies.body:
as an NA ex-riven main from before oce had a server the defaults my favourite

that arcade one is cringey as a mf

championships allright but its even worse on a bad player then aforementioned
I definitely think Dawnbringer Riven, her animations look really smooth and clean. She's also thicc af which is always handy for distracting your enemy laner xD
I have championship riven (just because i want to own all the championship skins) but I think dawnbringer is the better stand-alone skin. It kind of sounds like you already know what the answer is.

Dawnbringer has like 10x the number of In game quotes, and a bunch of neat specific interactions _(not least of which with Duskbringer Yasuo)_.

Or you could get championship and listen to the same old lines over and over and over and over again.
